data.title: The Mentor: Innovative Scholarship on Academic Advising
data.meta_description: The Mentor is a peer-reviewed academic advising journal devoted to introducing new and unsettling existing ideas relevant to advising in higher education. Originally known as The Mentor: An Academic Advising Journal, it was renamed The Mentor: Innovative Scholarship on Academic Advising in 2018 to reflect its rich history of publishing innovative ideas.
data.meta_site_name: The Mentor - An Academic Advising Journal
